title: Mathematical Competency Assessment Process Utilizing Resource-Centered Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A process of diagnosing mathematical competencies through project-based assessment in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment. Learners analyze real-world problem situations and develop resource-efficient problem-solving strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mathematical problems in a structured manner according to resource-based design principles.
Learners can extract core concepts of mathematical problems by efficiently utilizing limited cognitive resources.
Learners can produce artifacts that objectively demonstrate mathematical competencies in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
